<repo>
  https://github.com/google/googletest.git
  googletest build-cmake googletest/include/*

<repo>
  https://github.com/google/benchmark.git
  benchmark build-cmake include/*
  -D BENCHMARK_ENABLE_TESTING=OFF

<repo>
  https://github.com/wolfSSL/wolfssl.git
  wolfssl build-cmake wolfssl/
  -D WOLFSSL_RABBIT=ON
  -D WOLFSSL_ECC=ON

<repo>
  https://gitlab.com/federicomenaquintero/bzip2.git
  bzip2 build-cmake bzlib.h
  -D ENABLE_SHARED_LIB=ON

<repo>
  https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/freetype/freetype.git
  freetype build-cmake include/*
  -D SKIP_INSTALL_ALL=ON
  -D CMAKE_DISABLE_FIND_PACKAGE_ZLIB=ON
  -D CMAKE_DISABLE_FIND_PACKAGE_BZip2=ON
  -D CMAKE_DISABLE_FIND_PACKAGE_PNG=ON
  -D CMAKE_DISABLE_FIND_PACKAGE_HarfBuzz=ON
  -D CMAKE_DISABLE_FIND_PACKAGE_BrotliDec=ON
